sentences.en: A slide - rule is a simple analogue computer.
sentences.cn: 计算尺是简单的模拟计算机.

sentences.en: Analogue bandwidth is measured in Hertz Hz, cycles per second.
sentences.cn: 类比式频宽以赫兹测量每秒的传送周期.

sentences.en: Changing of alarm and control levels on analogue signals and controllers.
sentences.cn: 改变模拟信号和控制器的警报及控制水平.

sentences.en: DCA, or dichloroacetic acid, is an analogue of acetic acid in which chlorine atoms replace two of the three hydrogen atoms on the methyl group.
sentences.cn: DCA也叫二氯乙酸或二氯醋酸，是一种类似乙酸的化合物，但乙基团上有两个氢原子被氯原子所取代。

sentences.en: Every analogue wireless system has background noise to a certain extent.
sentences.cn: 每个模拟无线系统都有一定程度的电子干扰音.

sentences.en: Experimental water includes analogue dye wastewater and practical printing and dyeing wastewater.
sentences.cn: 试验用水包括模拟染料废水和实际印染废水两部分.

sentences.en: For comparison, its analogue linear polymer ( 5 ) was also synthesized.
sentences.cn: 同时,作为对比, 我们还合成了相对应的 线型 高分子.

sentences.en: However, analogue controller is dominant in electric propulsion system for underwater ship.
sentences.cn: 但在水下舰船的电力推进系统中, 模拟控制器仍占了大多数.

sentences.en: No model can ever be a perfect analogue of nature itself.
sentences.cn: 任何模型都无法完全模拟自然本身。

sentences.en: Scientists are attempting to compare features of extinct animals with living analogues.
sentences.cn: 科学家正试图把已灭绝动物的特征与现存类似动物相比较。

sentences.en: The analogue signals from the video tape are converted into digital code.
sentences.cn: 采自该录像带的模拟信号被转换成数字代码。

sentences.en: The gill of a fish is the analogue of the lung of a cat.
sentences.cn: 鱼的鳃和猫的肺是类似物.

sentences.en: The kanic acid (KA) is a structural analogue of the aminoglutaminic acid, excitatory amino acid in the brain.
sentences.cn: 海人酸（KA）是脑内兴奋性氨基酸递质—谷氨酸的结构类似物。

sentences.en: The modification suggestions feasibleare offered, based on the further more analogue computing.
sentences.cn: 并通过进一步的模拟修改计算,给出了改进建议.

sentences.en: The recent failures of financial institutions suggests an organisational analogue.
sentences.cn: 近来金融机构的接连倒闭提供了一种组织的类比.

sentences.en: The state - of - the - art of fault diagnosis for analogue circuits is introduced.
sentences.cn: 文中介绍了模拟电路故障诊断的研究现状.

sentences.en: These may either be the drug in question or some analogue of it that.
sentences.cn: 这些小分子可以是目标药物或其它一些类似物。

sentences.en: This fibre can be used for analogue and for digital transmission.
sentences.cn: 这种光纤能用作模拟传输与数字传输.

sentences.en: With respect to analogue data ; to place it in digital form.
sentences.cn: 将模拟量数据转换成数字形式.

words.tran_cn: 类似的；[昆] 同功的；可比拟的
对…作类比；以类推来说明（等于analogize）
类似的；相似物的；模拟计算机的
类似物；类似情况；对等的人

phrases.tran_cn: 模拟信号；仿真讯号；非数字讯号；模拟试验

trans.tran_en: analogue technology uses changing physical quantities such as  voltage  to store data
a thing that is similar to another thing
